income_messages:
From: d**************r@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-14 22:03:47
SUBJECT: Dear Applicant
Dear Applicant
I'm Dr. William Kassler . I deal with the supply of Bio-technological products. I am looking for someone that can be trusted and reliable to work very well with a good understanding as my Personal Assistant.This position I am offering is home-based and it's flexible i.e you work from home until i set up a physical branch in your area,you do not need previous experience to work.
Working with me is basically about instructions and following them, my only fear is that i may come at you impromptu Sometimes, I need someone who will be able to meet up with my irregular timings.i travel a lot and this is the reason why i need a personal assistance so much , i have clients who has bought goods from me on credit and might want to make payment while i am not around or might request for supply . In your job description , 
you help collect funds on my behalf ,send emails to old and new clients with receipt of purchase , process payment , 
documentation e.t.c
As my Personal Assistant, your activities among other things will also include the following :
1) Scheduling programmer's, flights and keeping me up-to-date with them.
2) Handling and monitoring some of my financial activities.
3) 
Processing weekly payment
 , Filing, Faxing, Creating and sending out letters, scanning documents, some  personal
assistant duties for owners, and many other
5) 
Managing expenses and invoices
6) process payment , documentation
7) 
collect funds from debtor / make payments on behalf of the Boss
8) collect invoice via email and documentation the funds collected and keep receipt for record purpose
9) Must be able to focus on details
10) Disbursement of funds to my retailers and keep proper records
11) 
Must have an active saving/ checking account for payment of salary, commission
 e.t.c
Your basic wage is € 650  weekly but payable every 2 weeks . you will start work fully in exactly Two weeks from when you are confirmed hired and the good thing is that you shall earn  €100 a day for 2 weeks before you start fully as  this will serve as  your start up bonus starting from the day you are hired ,this is to help you put yourself  in order before resumption. Once you resume fully in exactly 2 weeks from now , your basic wage begins to count as well.
Note : your job might not be everyday for now , It might be twice or three times a week  and not more than 3 hours , all you need to do is check your email frequently for my messages and you will still be paid for it but you have to be available online as i can reach you at any time
Kindly , let me know if you have an interest in working for me as my personal assistant,so that we can proceed to the next stage.
Regards
Dr .William Kassler
From: d**************r@gmail.com
To: fl42182@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 09:02:01
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Applicant
Dear  Adam Kelly
Compliments of the day and thanks for getting back to me. Furthermore, I'm
sure you'll understand that I tend to have a very busy schedule at this
point. Please note that this position is not office based for now because
of my frequent travels and tight schedules. It's part-time work from home
for now and the flexibility means that there will be busier weeks than
others.
I would like to give you an immediate trial, so if you are interested
kindly get back to me. As I have been checking my files and schedules and
would need someone urgently to run some errands for me this week/next week,
while I am away. I will  have some funds sent to you to complete the
errands and would get back to you with more information on that.
Get back to me with your Personal/Contact Details such as for proper
documentation.
1) FULL NAMES:_____________________
2) ADDRESS:_____________________
3) CITY:________________________
4) STATE:________________________
5) ZIP CODE:_________________________
6) HOME PHONE #:________________________
7) MOBILE PHONE#:_________________________
8) SEX:____________________________
9) EMAIL ADDRESS:_________________________
10) Current Job if any___________________________
11) Nationality: ___________________________
12) MARITAL STATUS:________________________
13)CURRENT OCCUPATION:_____________________
14) ALTERNATE EMAIL ADDRESS: ___________________
15) A scanned copy or photo shot of any government issued i.d of yours e.g
drivers license e.t.c
16) Are you eligible to work in the United States? Yes ____ No_____
17) How often do you check your email: ______________
18) Days/Hours Available: Hours Available: from _______ to ______
you can send me a text through whatsApp  +1 904-413-0801  for any emergency
  inquiry , when you have not access to email
Thanks in anticipation of your prompt response.looking forward to your
details and  answers to my question
Regards
Dr.William Kassler
From: d**************r@gmail.com
To: fl42182@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 19:41:43
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Applicant
Dear Adam Kelly,
In your first message you said you're interested that you need to know
more. That is the reason why we sent you our second step of the work
We can slow down a bit if you wish , Also  if you don't understand
.anything you can ask question
Regards
Dr.William Kassler
From: d**************r@gmail.com
To: fl42182@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-16 07:29:43
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Applicant
Dear Adam Kelly
Good day to you, we have just gone true your email and we are assuring you
that the  job offered to you is 100% sure, Our company  is not asking you
for any thing we are the one to pay you at the end of every month
Our company is trying to set up branches all over Europe, so we wish to
inform you to be rest assured that this job offered to you is legit 100%
Guarantee  and we ask for your information  to enable our  company
accountant to document your details in our system .
Regards
Dr .William Kassler

Time: 2023-03-16 13:07:32
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Applicant
Dear Adam Kelly
it's okay , there is know problem about sending money. You came forward

Regards
Dr. William Kassler

Dr. William Kassler
